title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2302.31 - Assurance, fund distribution-part c
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2302.31 - Assurance, fund distribution-part c

State Regulations

The State Education Department assures that funds it receives
from appropriations made under section 401(b) of title IV of the Elementary and

Secondary Education Act will be distributed among local educational agencies on
an equitable basis recognizing the competitive nature of grant-making. Further, the State Education Department will provide assistance in formulating proposals
and in operating programs to local educational agencies which are less able to
compete due to small size or lack of local financial
resources. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
